name: The Rat King King
description:
Control your ball of rat minions and ride them across a treturous dungeon, use them as ammo but be careful without them you're defenceless!

You play as the greedy rat king king who with his strength overpowers other rats to do his bidding. Traverse through a hostile dungeon to feed his unrelenting greed.

CONTROLS:
WASD - to move
MOUSE - to look
LEFT CLICK - to shoot
RIGHT CLICK - to aim

HOW TO PLAY:
Ride around on your rats and avoid traps
Shoot unlocked doors to open
Open locked doors by finding the correct key
Get to the end to get closer to the treasure; all the cheese you could ever desire!

THE TEAM:
Joel Tippett - Lead asset production / World population
Jevon Brandow - Coder
Fred Drabble - Lead character artist / Texture artist
Oscar Elliott-Knowles - Lead sound / Music
Jolie Elliott - Lead Concept / Lead Texture / UI
